metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12423 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: When the Windows DLL "webauthn.dll" was missing from the Operating System,and a malicious one was placed in a folder in the user's %PATH%, Firefoxmay have loaded the DLL, leading to arbitrary code execution. *Note: Thisissue only affects the Windows operating system; other operating systemsare unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 78.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
